title: slime_sex
body:
[[Oral]], [[vaginal]] ([[penis]] if male or [[futanari]]), or [[anal]] penetration by [[slime_(creature)]], to mimic the act of [[sex]].

[[Slime sex]] is considered separate from [[sex]] (if the sex situation happens without a [[penis]]), [[object insertion]], [[interspecies]], and [[bestiality]], and should not be used with those tags. However, it can and should still be tagged as [[vaginal]] or [[anal]].

For sex with [[slime girl]], use this tag only if slime girl uses slimy tentacles.

If penetrating with slimy tentacles and they act really like tentacles, use [[tentacle sex]] as well.

Don't use this tag if it is just about to be inserted, but hasn't penetrated yet. Use [[imminent penetration]] instead.

title: iron_maiden_(band)
body:
[b]Iron Maiden[/b] are an English "heavy metal":[/pools/6818] band formed in Leyton, East London, in 1975 by bassist and primary songwriter Steve Harris. The band's mascot, [[Eddie the Head]], has appeared on almost all of their album and single covers, videos and merchandise. Some of their most famous songs include "[[Run to the Hills]]", "[[The Trooper]]" and "[[Fear of the Dark]]".

on October's 2024, the first Vocalist, Paul Di'Anno, Dies on 66 Years

h4. Members
* Steve Harris
* Dave Murray
* Adrian Smith
* Bruce Dickinson
* Nicko McBrain
* Janick Gers

h5. Former members
* Paul Di'Anno †
* Dennis Stratton
* Clive Burr †
* Blaze Bayley

h4. Albums
* Iron Maiden (1980)
* Killers (1981)
* [[The Number of the Beast]] (1982)
* Piece of Mind (1983)
* Powerslave (1984)
* [[Somewhere in Time]] (1986)
* Seventh Son of a Seventh Son (1988)
* No Prayer for the Dying (1990)
* [[Fear of the Dark]] (1992)
* The X Factor (1995)
* Virtual XI (1998)
* Brave New World (2000)
* Dance of Death (2003)
* A Matter of Life and Death (2006)
* The Final Frontier (2010)
* The Book of Souls (2015)
* [[Senjutsu (album)|]] (2021)

h4. External links
* "Wikipedia: Iron Maiden":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iron_Maiden]
* "Metallum: Iron Maiden":[https://www.metal-archives.com/bands/Iron_Maiden/25]

title: type_o_negative
body:
An american [[Heavy Metal|gothic metal]] band from New York, formed on 1989 by [[Peter Steele]].

The band was composed by Peter Steele (vocals, bass), Kenny Hickey (guitars, backing vocals), Josh Silver (keyboards, piano, backing vocals) 
and Johnny Kelly (drums).

Their lyrics generally speak of love relationships, [[depressed|depression]], [[death]], sex, Religion and personal issues experiences of Steele during his own career.

Steele passed away on April 14, 2010 as the result of a heart attack due to Sepsis, leading to the band's breakup.

h1. See also
Wikipedia: "Type O Negative":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Type_O_Negative
Metallum: "Type O Negative":https://www.metal-archives.com/bands/Type_O_Negative/802
other_names: タイプ・オー・ネガティヴ

title: death_(band)
body:
Death were an American death metal band formed in the mid 80's. They are considered to be one of the two founders of death metal along with Possessed.

The band disbanded in 2001 after the band's frontman, Chuck Schuldiner, died after lost the battle against a brain tumor.

title: mountain_(arknights)
body:
[i]The unchained jail tiger himself, Mountain, immovable as his name.[/i]

A playable Guard Operator in [[Arknights]].

Real Name: Anthony Simon

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Columbia[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]July 16[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Feline[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]195 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Prison Brawling Experience:[/td]
      [td]6 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

Mountain is the son of a top Columbian construction CEO who was put in prison after being framed by a rival corporation. He enlisted into Rhodes Island upon his escape.

Despite his intimidating physique and powerful strength, Mountain has a courteous and polite personality, with a love of wine. However, he shows a more vicious and violent side when on the battlefield. His weapons of choice are brass knuckles.

He is the main character in the side story [i]"Mansfield Break"[/i]. 

His motif is based on the white tiger.

His [[voice actor]]s are [[Nakai Kazuya]] (Japanese), and Neo Wang (Chinese). His art designer is [[WincalBlanke]]

h4. Skins

* !post #5660546: [[mountain_(book_reader)_(arknights)|Book Reader]]
* [[Mountain (Dark Cloud) (Arknights)|Dark Cloud]]

A Yanese Catastrophe Messenger working with Rhodes Island. She travels between remote villages in the northwestern region of Yan.

As a memento to a friend with whom she departed bitterly, she brings his camera everywhere to continue his unfinished project by filming the scenery and the harsh livelihoods of the villages that she visits.

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Hirata Hiromi]] (Japanese), Da Wang (Chinese), Vivian Lu (English), and Cha Young-hee (Korean). Her art designer is [[yuan quanquan ren]].

title: hellagur_(arknights)
body:
[i]Hellagur, the visionary Azazel Guard, is joining you to help you achieve your goals.[/i]

A playable Guard Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]

A former member of the Ursus Imperial Guard. He is the acting manager of [i]Azazel[/i], an underground clinic for the infected in Chernobog, which was destroyed after the fall of city at the end of Episode One. 

His mature knowledge of military theoretical systems and his ability in combat make him suitable for a vast majority of combat operations. He is currently in an agreement to be stationed at Rhodes Island, where he provides tactical support.

His choice of weapon is a massive [[ootachi]]. His motif is based on a hippogriff.

His [[voice actor]]s are [[Hayami Shou]] (Japanese), Liu Ruoban (Chinese), Paul Herzberg (English), Si Young-jun (Korean), and Denis Aleksandrovich Nekrasov (Russian). His illustrator is [[Liduke]].

body:
[i]Utage, Guard Operator, is standing around on the front lines lazily.[/i]

A playable Guard Operator in [[Arknights]].

An ordinary student from Higashi. She came aboard Rhodes Island to treat her Oripathy, where applied to become an operator.

Cheerful and outgoing personality, she often hangs aroun other Higashi operators, such as [[Kirara (arknights)|]] and [[Akafuyu (arknights)|]]. She closely follows the market of the latest fashion trends and a lot of people come to her for advices on the topic. 

While her duties mostly consist of Logistics and HR, she has proven quite capable in combat where she exhibits a terrifying demeanor. She is able to completely mask her psychological state.

Her race and her [[katana]] are shrouded in mystery.

Her [[voice actor]]s are Yoshioka Mayu (Japanese), Xu Xu (Chinese), and Choi Ha-ri (Korean). Her art designer is [[kamameshi gougoumaru]].

To divert Sideroca from her self-destructive urge to train, [[Dobermann (arknights)|]] secretly convinced her to take care of the [[Doctor (arknights)|]]'s unfitness. She enthusiastically obliged and, to convince the Doctor to set foot in the gym, she quickly learnt how to cook to entice them with food in exchange of working out.

title: amiya_(guard)_(arknights)
body:
One of operator [[Amiya (Arknights)|Amiya]]'s alternate forms.


She gained such form near the end of [i]Chapter 8: Roaring Flare[/i], [spoiler]during the fight alongside Ch'en against [[Talulah (Arknights)|]].[/spoiler]

As a Guard operator, she wields a sword identical to [[Ch'en (Arknights)|Ch'en's]] Chi Xiao, and her second skill is essentially Ch'en's [[ch'en (elite ii) (arknights)|second promotion]] skill with some alterations.

Her original art designer is [[yui (niikyouzou)]], while her [b]Touch the Stars[/b] outfit is drawn by [[mag (mag42)|mag42]].

title: pallas_(arknights)
body:
[i]Priestess Pallas, come from Minos.[/i]

A playable Guard Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Minos[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]February 8[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Forte[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]

      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]3 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

A former Minoan priestess who arrived at Rhodes Island to treat her Oripathy in secret and works as an operator. She is often accompanied by a nameless [[Sarkaz bodyguard (arknights)|]].

Because of her Oripathy, she was secretly exhiled to a remote village, which she revitalized by promoting arts and tourism. She fought against the incursions of foreign tribes and negotiated a truce with them. As such, she is considered as an heroine and goddess by the locals.

She dreams of being recognized as heroine by the entire country and return to her homeland.

She likes the classical arts and drinking profusely.

Her motif is based on the African buffalo.

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Inoue Marina]] (Japanese), Zhou Yihan (Chinese), Kaiti Ntroudi (English) and Kim Hyun-sim (Korean). Her art designer is [[aZLing]].

title: tokyo_mirage_sessions_fe
body:
[b]Tokyo Mirage Sessions ♯FE[/b] (幻影異聞録♯FE, [i]Gen'ei Ibunroku ♯FE[/i]) is a 2015 crossover game of the [[Shin Megami Tensei]] series and the [[Fire Emblem]] series, released for the Nintendo [[Wii U]].

An expanded version of the game, titled [i]Tokyo Mirage Sessions ♯FE Encore[/i], was released for the [[Nintendo Switch]] in January 2020. 

The cast of characters includes many original characters new to the game, as well as variants of monsters seen in the Shin Megani Tensei series, and various Mirages based on characters from [[Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem]] and [[Fire Emblem Awakening]].

h4. Characters

h6. Playable characters

* [[Aoi Itsuki]] 
** [[Chrom (Fire Emblem)|]] 
* [[Oribe Tsubasa]] 
** [[Caeda (Fire Emblem)|]] 
* [[Akagi Toma]] 
** [[Cain (Fire Emblem: Shadow Dragon)|]] 
* [[Kurono Kiria]] 
** [[Tharja (Fire Emblem)|]] 
* [[Yumizuru Eleanora]] 
** [[Virion (Fire Emblem)|]] 
* [[Minamoto Mamori]] 
** [[Draug (Fire Emblem)|]] 
* [[Tsurugi Yashiro]] 
** [[Navarre (Fire Emblem)|]] 

h6. Side characters

* [[Shimazaki Maiko]] 
* [[Barry Goodman]] 
* [[Tiki (Fire Emblem)|]] 
* [[Oribe Ayaha]] 

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Tokyo Mirage Sessions ♯FE":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tokyo_Mirage_Sessions_%E2%99%AFFE]

title: stewie_griffin
body: Stewart Gilligan "Stewie" Griffin is a character from the animated television series [[Family Guy]]. He is voiced by the series creator Seth MacFarlane. Son of [[Peter Griffin|Peter]] and [[Lois Griffin]]
other_names: ステューウィー・グリフィン

title: brian_griffin
body: Brian Griffin is One of the main characters of [[Family Guy]]. An anthropomorphic white Labrador retriever voiced by Seth MacFarlane, he is the Best fríend of [[Stewie Griffin]].
other_names: ブライアン・グリフィン

title: peter_griffin
body:
The main protagonist of the American TV show [[Family Guy]]. A dim-witted, [[fat]] man with an impulsive personality who works at a beer factory.

Due to a series of [[meme]] fanarts by [[Kowai (iamkowai)|]], he has become subjected to various random [[crossover]] fanarts with anime girls by Twitter artists. Mostly for comedic reasons.

Peter was added to [[Fortnite]] as a playable character skin in 2023. The skin depicts him as a [[muscular male|muscular man]] instead of his usual physique, but maintains his distinctive double chin.

h4. See also

* [[Homer Simpson]]
other_names: ピーター・グリフィン

title: meg_griffin
body: Megatron "Meg" Harvey Oswald Griffin is a character from [[Family Guy]]. The oldest child of [[Lois Griffin|Lois]] and [[Peter Griffin]], and the sister of [[Chris Griffin|Chris]] and [[Stewie Griffin]]. She is currently attending James Woods Regional High School.

title: spray
body:
"Spray" is an ambiguous term. Use a more specific tag from below: 

* [b]Action[/b] — [[Spraying]] (for projecting a liquid in a dispersive manner at a target, like water with a hose; or when using spray bottles/cans)
* [b]Generic objects[/b] — [[Spray bottle]] / [[Spray can]]
* [b]Objects for specific tasks[/b] — [[Spray paint]] (graffiti) / [[Bug spray]] / [[Hair spray]] / [[Deodorant]] / [[Pepper spray]] (weapon)
* [[Sea spray]]
* [[Blood spray]] (blood erupting from a body or object)

title: pepper_spray
body: A [[weapon]] typically used in self-defence situations, contained in a small portable [[spray can]]. It causes severe irritation, pain and a burning sensation when in contact with the eyes.

title: element_of_kindness
body: One of the six [[Elements of Harmony]], wielded by [[Fluttershy]]. Typically takes the form of a pink [[butterfly]]-shaped gem inset in a gold [[necklace]].

title: element_of_honesty
body: One of the six [[Elements of Harmony]], wielded by [[Applejack]]. Typically takes the form of an orange [[apple]]-shaped gem inset in a gold [[necklace]].

title: element_of_generosity
body: One of the six [[Elements of Harmony]], wielded by [[Rarity (my little pony)|]]. Typically takes the form of a purple [[diamond (shape)|]]-shaped gem inset in a gold [[necklace]].

title: element_of_loyalty
body: One of the six [[Elements of Harmony]], wielded by [[Rainbow Dash]]. Typically takes the form of a red [[lightning bolt symbol|lightning bolt]]-shaped gem inset in a gold [[necklace]].

title: element_of_laughter
body: One of the six [[Elements of Harmony]], wielded by [[Pinkie Pie]]. Typically takes the form of a blue [[balloon]]-shaped gem inset in a gold [[necklace]].

title: element_of_magic
body: One of the six [[Elements of Harmony]], wielded by [[Twilight Sparkle]]. Typically takes the form of a magenta [[hexagram]]-shaped gem inset in a [[tiara]] (unlike the others, which all take the form of necklaces).

title: twilight_(my_little_pony_g1)
body:
Character from the [[my little pony (g1)|first generation]] of [[My Little Pony]], more specifically [[My Little Pony 'n Friends]]. She is a pink [[unicorn]] with a white and purple mane, and a star [[cutie mark]].

She was the original source of inspiration for [[Twilight Sparkle]].

Not to be confused with the later pegasus pony from the toyline, [[So Soft Twilight]].

title: broca_(arknights)
body:
[i]Broca, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, is busy defending the other Operators on the front lines.[/i]

A playable Guard Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Siracusa[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]

      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Feline[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]189 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]5 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

A former Siracusan mafioso of few words. After a certain incident, he became a member of [[Chiave (arknights)|]]’s gang, and now serves Rhodes Island as a front-line attacker.

His motif is based on the panther.

His [[voice actor]]s are Toriumi Kousuke (Japanese), Zhaokun Liu (Chinese), and Sung Wankyung (Korean). His art designer is [[Infukun]].

h4. Skins
* [[broca_(rest_between_sets)_(arknights)|Rest Between Sets]]
other_names: ブローカ(アークナイツ)

title: specter_(arknights)
body:
[i]Specter from the Abyssal Hunters is already done with her prayer and is now prowling the battlefield.[/i]

A playable Guard Operator in [[Arknights]].

Real Name: [spoiler]Laurentina[/spoiler]

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]

      [td]162 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]7 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

An enigmatic and severely unstable nun who initially approached Rhodes Island to deliver a "message". Most notable due to her tremendous strength enabling her to withstand devastating attacks from enemies normally meant to incapacitate other operators in a couple of hits.

Uses a circular saw as her preferred weapon.

Her motif is based on the bull shark and the helicoprion.

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Asakura Azumi]] (Japanese), Zhang Anqi (Chinese), Harriet Carmichael (English), and Kim Hyeon-sim (Korean). Her art designer is [[Skade]].

title: estelle_(arknights)
body:
[i]Estelle, Guard Operator of Rhodes Island, still doubts if she can help.[/i]

A playable Guard Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Undisclosed[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]February 14[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Archosauria[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]162 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]1/2 year[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

An Archosaurian girl whose Oripathy developed a pair of mutated horns. She sought medical asylum on Rhodes Island after other treatments failed to cure her condition.

Due to her mutation she is nervous and self-restrained, but demonstrates extreme ferocity when fighting in battle.

Her pet bird is called Sir Cromwell.

Her [[voice actor]]s are Yamamoto Nozomi (Japanese), Miao Yang (Chinese), Clare Corbett (English) and Kim Seo-young (Korean). Her art designer is [[Yagiinu]].
other_names: エステル(アークナイツ)

title: silverash_(arknights)
body:
[i]SilverAsh, President of Karlan Trade Co., Ltd., has signed the contract with Rhodes Island and is ready to join the field.[/i]

A playable Guard Operator in [[Arknights]].

Real Name: Enciodes Silverash

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Kjerag[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]February 15[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Feline[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]192 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]4 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

The calm and collected chairman of Karlan Trading Company and current patriarch of the Silverash family. He is the oldest of the Silverash siblings, being the older brother of both [[pramanix_(arknights)|Enya "Pramanix" Silverash]] and [[cliffheart_(arknights)|Ensia "Cliffheart" Silverash]]. His choice of weapon is a cane sword. He is also accompanied by his pet bird [[tenzin_(arknights)|Tenzin]], which also acts as his ranged attack.

The fact that he is the last male heir of the Silverash family has lead to a fanart theme depicting him making a huge deal out of the Doctor marrying either of his sisters in order to continue his bloodline, despite not expressing such desires in canon.

Just like his sisters, his motif is based on the snow leopard.

His [[voice actor]]s are [[Konishi Katsuyuki]] (Japanese), Wu Lei (Chinese), James Day (English) and Nam Doh-hyeong (Korean). His art designer is [[Ryuuzaki Ichi]].

h4. Skins

body:
Bistro Cupid is a RPG cooking and dating simulation game.
It started out as a Chinese exclusive for Windows in the 2000. There is also a Japanese and Korean version with the Japanese one coming out on [[Xbox]] and Windows in 2002.

A Vampire Sarkaz who works as an operator in Rhodes Island's Op Reserve Team A6.

He was a very popular producer at a host club in Higashi. Boastful and eccentric, he actually cares deeply about his teammates.

His [[voice actor]]s are Takuya Satou (Japanese), Ma Yang (Chinese), Alex Jordan (English), and Kang Ho-chul (Korean). His art designer is [[ryuuzaki ichi]].

A playable Vanguard operator in [[Arknights]].

A bounty hunter who spent her early years in the barrens, before entered Yan territory and commissioned to Shangshu City. Thereafter came to cooperate with Rhodes Island as an operator.

As the Tactician Vanguard, she fights with a [[crossbow]], and her trained [[baku (creature)|Slumberfoot]].

Her motif is based on 'black night' leopard [[gecko]]s.

Her [[voice actor]]s are Noda Junko (Japanese), Qiwen (Chinese), Norma Butikofer (English), and Yun A-yeong (Korean). Her art designer is [[Wenquangua]].

[i]Elysium, Vanguard Operator, ensures that operations proceed smoothly by providing stable battlefield communications.[/i]

A playable Vanguard Operator in [[Arknights]].

An Iberian operator specializing in a unique form of voice-related Originium Arts. As the leader of the 3rd Special Operations Squad, Elysium is responsible for maintaining clear channels of communication on the battlefield and assisting squad members in covert operations.

His motif is based on arctic terns. His callsign, which pertains to [i]paradise[/i], is a reference to the bird's scientific name [i]Sterna paradisaea[/i].

His [[voice actor]]s are [[Morikubo Shoutarou]] (Japanese), Feng Ming (Chinese), and Na Do-hyeong (Korean). His art designer is [[Skade]].

title: abductor_virgin
body: [b]Abductor Virgins[/b] are large mechanical enemies in [[Elden Ring]]. These machines come in two varieties, one that has two large spinning wheels and the other with two chained blades. Both can open their lower compartment to 'abduct' the [[Tarnished (elden ring)]] with snake-like appendages into their iron-maiden-like body. Abductor Virgins are warmachines constructed by the Volcano Manor.

title: myrtle_(arknights)
body:
[i]Myrtle, Vanguard of Rhodes Island, is ready to lead the charge into battle![/i]

A playable Vanguard Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile

A Rhodes Island operator who came from the underground Durin community, being very curious about the outside world. She likes group operations and likes to be where everyone else is. Her appearance and temperament are somewhat childish, but on the battlefield, she displays considerable enthusiasm and knack for command.

Her choice of weapon is a flagpole. Her motif is based on butterflies.

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Shimoji Shino]] (Japanese), Gin (Chinese), Hollie Taylor (English), and Chunq Yu-joung (Korean). Her art designer is [[Miebao]].

She doesn't like thinking too much, but nevertheless stands up to injustice and will fight until the bitter end for the sake of her friends.

Her [[voice actor]]s are Tomo Muranaka (Japanese), Liu Shisi (Chinese), Judy Alice Lee (English), and Kim Young-eun (Korean). Her art designer is [[NoriZC]].

title: grani_(arknights)
body:
[i]Grani, Vanguard Operator of Rhodes Island and mounted police, will clear all obstacles in the way using her lance.[/i]

A playable Vanguard Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Victoria[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]December 1[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Kuranta[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]154 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]2 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

A former member of the Victorian Mounted Police who works as a contract operator for Rhodes Island. She specializes in high mobility operations such as raids, mechanized warfare, and infiltration. She provides support for all Rhodes Island op teams, as well as patrols of the island and its surrounding areas. Her choice of weapon is a collapsible light rifle that can be used as a spear.

Together with [[Skadi_(Arknights)|Skadi]], she is the primary protagonist in the side story [i]Grani and the Knights' Treasure[/i].

Her motif is based on horses. Her callsign is named after the horse owned by the mythological hero [i]Sigurd[/i].

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Yamazaki Haruka]] (Japanese), Muyaruilin (Chinese), Carina Reeves (English), and Lee Jae-hyun (Korean). Her art designer is [[alchemaniac]].

title: vigna_(arknights)
body:
[i]Vigna, Vanguard Operator of Rhodes Island, is ready for combat with the lance in her hands.[/i]

A playable Vanguard Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Kazdel[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]December 12[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Sarkaz[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]142 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]1 year[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

Vigna is a Sarkaz that was admitted into Rhodes Island following a battery of screenings, showing good potential in skirmishes, raids, and coordinated combat. Currently a Vanguard with an advance squad at Rhodes Island, with outstanding performance in both tactical raids and frontline combat.

An avid rock and roll music fan and an amateur guitarist. Outspoken and wields an indomitable resolve. Because of this and her and rough upbringing, this constantly got her into fights. Implied to have a height complex in one of her in-game interactions.

Uses a [[bident]] during combat, with an additional stabbing implement in between the prongs as seen on her "second promotion":[/posts/3866512]. Her existing skins show her wielding a whole [[trident]] instead.

Due to her Sarkaz race, her motif is based on demons. "红豆" means [i]red bean[/i], scientific name [i]Vigna angularis[/i], which makes it the basis for her callsign.

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Shimoda Asami]] (Japanese), Zhang Anqi (Chinese), Julia Gu (English), and Ahn Hyun-seo (Korean). Her art designer is [[Xiayehongming]].

h4. Skins

body:
[i]Plume, Vanguard Operator of Rhodes Island, will provide reliable defense for the squad and hold back the enemy.[/i]

A playable Vanguard Operator in [[Arknights]].

  [/tbody]

She has [[yellow eyes]], and [[brown hair|brown]] and [[white hair]] with an [[ahoge]] sticking out from beneath her [[black headwear|black]] [[beret]]. In game, she wears a [[cloak]] with [[strap|straps]], [[elbow gloves]], and [[black thighhighs]] with [[garter straps]]. Due to her race of [b]Liberi[/b], she has bird aspects, notably [[feather hair]] and [[feathered wings]].

She is a former member of the Laterano Guard who bumbled her way out of Laterano and into Rhodes Island. She performs security, inspection, and loss prevention duties.

Her motif is based on the peregrine falcon.

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Tachibana Rika]] (Japanese), Vila (Chinese), Rosie Jones (English), and Yoon Mi-na (Korean). Her art designer is [[deel (rkeg)|]].

title: saga_(arknights)
body:
[i]The wandering monk, Saga, joins in on the action wherever she goes.[/i]

A playable Vanguard Operator in [[Arknights]].

h4. Profile
[expand]

      [td]2 years[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]

A wandering monk from Higashi. Originally entered a Rhodes Island office by mistake; once inquiries showed she was interested in employment, she passed the exams and joined the company. Seems to have previously made links with Rhodes Island Operator [[Lava (Arknights)|]].

Extremely outgoing, has a knack for learning new things, and a heavy eater. Most notable among players for her loud battlecries, some of which are based on food.

One of the protagonists of the side story [i]Who is Real[/i].

Uses a [[naginata]] during combat. Her motif is based on the [[shiba inu]]. Her callsign is derived from "Emperor Saga":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Saga].

Her [[voice actor]]s are Kobayashi Sanae (Japanese), Lü Qi (Chinese), and Soyeon (Korean). Her art designer is [[Duoyuanjun]].

body:
[i]Zima, Vanguard Operator of Rhodes Island, will give the squad a tactical advantage with her physical strength at the start of every battle[/i]

The rude and violent leader of the Ursus Student Self-Governing Group, with [[Istina_(Arknights)|Istina]], [[Rosa_(arknights)|Rosa]], [[Leto_(arknights)| Leto]], and [[Gummy_(Arknights)|Gummy]] as members. She led her group to escape the Catastrophe that overwhelmed Chernobog at the end of Episode One. She decides to join up with Rhodes Island to provide shelter for her comrades. Despite her brash personality, she is an avid bookworm. She's also extremely loyal to her friends and won't hesitate to stand up for them if they're in trouble. Her weapon of choice is a hand axe.

One of the protagonists of the side story event [i]Children of Ursus[/i].

Her motif is based on grizzly bears. Her callsign "Зима", means [i]Winter[/i] in Russian.

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Koshimizu Ami]] (Japanese), You Fei (Chinese), Amy Lennox (English), Lee Myung-hi (Korean), and Eva Finkelstein (Russian). Her art designer is [[Skade]].

Leader of Rhodes Island's Op Team A4 and cornerstone of the company. Her skin is sensitive to sunlight, so she wears a [[mask]] and usually works at night.

She is known to complete her missions swiftly and efficiently, but at the cost of disregarding her teamates' opinions and damaging herself.

[spoiler]A former assassin of Higashi. During a mission she fought [[Noir Corne (arknights)|]], who was working for the enemy side, but then chose to flee the war-torn Higashi together and join Rhodes Island.[/spoiler]

Her [[voice actor]]s are [[Fujita Saki]] (Japanese), Hou Xiaofei (Chinese), Jessica McDonald (English), and Woo Jeong-sin (Korean). Her original art designer is [[Skade]].

title: machita_chima
body:
A [[Nijisanji]] [[virtual YouTuber]], part of the second wave of Nijisanji SEEDs and designed by [[Kurihara Sakura]]. 

She is portrayed with [[long hair|long]] [[white hair]] and [[yellow eyes]].

Her default outfit consists of a [[pink cardigan]], a buttoned [[white shirt]] top, [[blue ribbon]], [[brown skirt]], white [[thighhighs]], [[loafers]], a bag slung to her front left, and a [[seed]] [[hair ornament]].

title: elhawk
body: A [[prototype design]] [[Pokemon (creature)|]] that resembles a mix of [[Latias]] and [[Blaziken]]. Was given the fan nickname of “Latiken” before the [[2024 Pokemon Teraleak]] revealed its true name of Elhawk.

title: maria_(silent_hill)
body: Maria is a major character and arguably the primary antagonist of [[Silent Hill 2]], while she serves as the protagonist of Silent Hill 2: Born from a Wish.

title: gundam_ez8
body:
A fictional military manned giant robot from the [[Gundam]] [[mecha]]verse.

[b]RX-79 [G] Ez-8 Gundam Ez8[/b]

A field repaired version of the [[Ground Gundam]] [[mobile_suit|MS]], using literally anything that could be found and fit. Due to a lack of spare parts for the already improvised Ground Types, many things such as the V-fin were omitted, but the end result was a machine that had somewhat higher specs than the normal Ground Gundam. 

Its name stands for [b]Extra Zero Eight[/b], as a nod to the [[gundam_08th_ms_team|08th MS Team]], the only unit to operate the improvised type in the hands of their commander [[Shiro Amada]].

title: sonic_the_hedgehog_(beta_design)
body:
The original [[prototype design]] for [[Sonic the Hedgehog]]. Playable in [[Sonic Superstars]] as simply "Rabbit Skin", but also known amongst fans as "Feels the Rabbit".

This character is actually a rabbit rather than a hedgehog, one with light blue fur, wearing [[white footwear|white shoes]] and a [[red bowtie]].

title: kale_zavaleta

title: gm_command
body:
Aa fictional military manned giant robot from the [[Gundam]] [[mecha]]verse.

[b]RGM-79G GM Command [/b]

An enhanced, highly improved [[gm (mobile suit)|GM]] [[mobile_suit|MS]] intended for [[earth_federation_space_forces|EFSF]] officer use in and near colonies. It had more precise controls, a new thruster arrangement that increased mobility and speed, and a new model beam gun that could be accurately fired to minimize collateral damage.

title: wuhan
body:
Wuhan is the capital city of Hubei province in central China.  It is the 9th largest city in China by population and is considered the political, economic, financial, commercial, cultural, and educational center of Central China.  

In December 2019 it was the site of the first discovered cases of SARS-CoV-2 which would cause a [[coronavirus_pandemic |global pandemic]].

h4. Locations and sights

* [[Yellow Crane Tower]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Wuhan":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wuhan]

title: resolution_comparison_(meme)
body:
An image macro that contrast a low-resolution depiction of a character alongside a high-definition version.

This meme gained a small resurgence on Twitter in September 2024 with artists drawing characters in normal and various styles of [[chibi]] forms with in-between resolutions added.

An offshoot of this meme is the "RTX Off / RTX On" meme which is based on various Nvidia tech demo videos showcasing the new Real-Time Ray Tracing functionality of their then-upcoming GeForce RTX 2000 series GPUs in 2018.

h4. Examples
* !asset #23111202
* !asset #23111214

h4. External Links
* "KnowYourMeme: Resolution Comparisons":[https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/resolution-comparisons]
* "KnowYourMeme: RTX Off / RTX On":[https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/rtx-off-rtx-on]

title: fraw_bow
body:
A fictional female character from the [[Gundam]] series. She first appeared in [[Mobile Suit Gundam]] from 1979 and also appears in [[Zeta Gundam]] (1985).

[b]Fraw Bow[/b] is [[Amuro Ray]]'s neighbor and best friend at the begining of the series. She  later becomes part of the junior crew of the [[White Base]] [[Earth Federation]] [[spacecraft]]. 

[spoilers]After the events of the original Gundam, Fraw married [[Hayato Kobayashi]], became pregnant with his child, and adopted orphans [[Katz Kobayashi]], [[Letz Cofan]], and [[Kikka Kitamoto]]. Despite all that however she is still in love with Amuro Ray. During [[Zeta Gundam]] Katz is killed in the Battle of Gryps, and though she does not appear in [[Gundam ZZ]] she was tragically widowed when Hayato was killed during the [[Colony Drop]] on Dublin, [[Ireland]].[/spoilers]

title: splatoon_(series)
body:
[b]Splatoon[/b] (スプラトゥーン [i]Supuratuun[/i]) is [[Nintendo]]'s 3rd-person multiplayer shooter video game that stars [[squid]] humanoids called [[inkling player character|Inklings]] that wield various weapons such as [[super soaker]]s, [[paint roller]]s, [[paintbrush|paint brushes]] and so on.

The game starts by the player creating and customizing her/his own Inkling and being able to play either single player or multiplayer modes.

In [[Splatoon 2]] and [[Splatoon 3]], the player can choose to play as the [[octopus]] humanoids, [[Octoling player character|Octolings]].

title: cosmos_(flower)
body:
[b]Cosmos[/b] are annual plants of the [i]Asteraceae[/i] family with [[daisy]]-like [[flower]]s that sit atop long, slender stems with lacy foliage. Their colors and numbers of petals vary depending on the species, though most varieties have eight broad, usually notched or serrated petals. Their flowerheads may be bowl– or open cup–shaped. The leaves are simple, pinnate, or bipinnate, and arranged in opposite pairs.

Besides [i]Cosmos bipinnatus[/i], the garden cosmos or cosmea, other commonly depicted species are [i]C. sulphureus[/i] (yellow/sulfur cosmos) and [i]C. atrosanguineus[/i] (chocolate cosmos). Sulfur cosmos can be distinguished by their bright yellow, orange, or pale red colors; they also have a protruding center called a ray floret. And chocolate cosmos can be distinguished by their dark red to dark brown colors and wide protruding ray florets, somewhat reminiscent of [[zinnia]]s.

h4. Examples
* !asset #23586972: [i]Cosmos atrosanguineus[/i] (Chocolate cosmos)
* !asset #21233468: [i]Cosmos bipinnatus[/i] (Common/garden cosmos)
* !asset #23586937: [i]Cosmos sulphureus[/i] (Sulfur/yellow cosmos)
* !post #1864399: Chocolate cosmos
* !post #3698027: Garden cosmos

h4. Other Asteraceae species

title: ikuhara_kunihiko
body:
A famous anime director, recognizable by his shoujo-esque visual style and prodigious use of symbolism.

He is most well known for the landmark [[Shoujo Kakumei Utena|Revolutionary Girl Utena]].

Other major series by Ikuhara, in whole or in part, include:

* [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon|Sailor Moon]] (frequent episode director over seasons 1 and 2, series director for seasons 3 and 4)
* [[Mawaru Penguindrum]]
* [[Yuri Kuma Arashi]]
* [[Sarazanmai]]

title: shinkawa_youji
body:
Lead artist & character designer at [[Konami]].

Most famous for his work (character, environment & mechanical designs) for the [[metal_gear_(series)|Metal Gear]] and [[Zone of the Enders]] series. He also worked on [[Policenauts]].

He uses ink pens with a brush-like felt-tip preferring the Pentel Brush Pen and both Adobe Photoshop and Corel Painter for his creations.

title: shuma_gorath
body:
A [i][[Doctor Strange (series)|]][/i] villain, better known for his playable appearances in the [i][[Marvel vs. Capcom]][/i] series. 

Shuma Gorath is part of a pantheon of extradimensional gods called the Many-Angled Ones. He has conquered many universes, being powerful enough to have defeated the Eternities and Deaths of those universes.

Although he frequently appears as a green octopus, there is some debate as to whether this is his true form or simply the form his energy takes while in our dimension.

The name Shuma Gorath was first mentioned in a 'Kull' story by Robert E. Howard titled 'The Curse of the Golden Skull', which went unpublished till 1967.

title: off-shoulder_dress
body:
A [[dress]] implicitly designed with a low and wide-cut neckline that leaves the shoulders and upper chest area [[bare shoulders|bare]]. The sleeves [i]must be attached[/i] to the dress.

Off-shoulder dresses are meant to accentuate the wearer's shoulders, [[collarbone]], and neck (or [[nape]]), with the sleeves of an off-shoulder dress sitting on the upper arms instead of on top of the shoulders.

h4. Correct examples
* !post #6687597
* !post #7331154
* !post #6706883
* !post #7925516
* !post #6980464
* !post #7237300

h4.Incorrect examples
This tag is not meant as a "catch-all" tag for any dresses that simply exposes the bare shoulders; the following dress styles are not off-shoulder dresses:
* !post #7386660: [[Strapless dress]] with [[detached sleeves]] or [[elbow gloves]]
* !post #6621572: [[Strapless dress]]
* !post #7457827: [[Sleeveless dress]]
* !post #7178466: [[Sleeveless dress]] worn with a [[jacket]]/[[coat]] worn [[off shoulder|hanging off the arms]]
* !post #7187911: [[Kimono]] worn [[off shoulder|hanging off the arms]].
* !post #7137498: [[Shoulder cutout]]
* !post #7331029: [[Strap slip]]

h6.Mutually exclusive tags
* [[Strapless dress]]
* [[Sleeveless dress]]
* [[Single-shoulder dress]]

h4.See also

* [[Off shoulder]]
* [[Off-shoulder shirt]]
* [[Off-shoulder sweater]]
* [[Off-shoulder one-piece swimsuit]]
* [[Off-shoulder bikini]]

title: gm_quel
body:
A fictional military manned giant robot from the [[Gundam]] [[mecha]]verse. It first appeared in [[Gundam 0083]].

[b]RGM-79Q GM Quel[/b]

The first [[mobile_suit|MS]] developed by the fledgling [[titans_(gundam)|Titans]]. Taking the fast but unimpressive [[GM Custom]] as a base, the unit was simplified to reduce costs and received upgraded beam weapons that were unavailable to previous GM variants. It served diligently if unspectacularly until it was ultimately replaced by the [[Hizack]] in frontline service.

title: gundam_0083
body:
[b][i]Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory[/i][/b] (Japanese: 機動戦士ガンダム0083 STARDUST MEMORY, Hepburn: [i]Kidō Senshi Gandamu Daburuōeitīsurī Sutādasuto Memorī[/i]) is a 13 episode [[Gundam]] [[mecha]] anime [[science fiction]] OVA series released in 1991.

title: himekaidou_hatate
body:
The "Modern-Day Spirit Photographer". One of the two playable characters of [[Touhou]]'s [[Double Spoiler]].

A tengu with the power of long-range spirit photography using a [[flip phone]]-like device, thus ridding her of the need to go outside, and rival of fellow tengu/journalist/protagonist [[Shameimaru Aya]]. Like Aya, she also circulates her own newspaper, [[Kakashi Spirit News]]. A common pun is replacing the は in her name with ほ, for Hotate: [[scallop]], then depicting her as one. 

h4. Appearance 
* !asset #23585114

She has [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair|brown]] [[twintails]] tied with [[purple bow|purple]] [[hair bow|bows]], a [[purple hat|purple]] [[tokin hat]], [[brown eyes|brown]] or [[purple eyes]], and occasionally [[black wings|black]] [[feathered wings]]. She wears a [[short sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[white shirt]] with a [[frilled shirt collar|frilled]] [[collared shirt|collar]], a [[black necktie]], a [[purple skirt|purple]] and [[black skirt|black]] [[checkered skirt]], [[black socks|black]] [[kneehighs]], and either [[brown footwear|brown]] [[geta]] or [[loafers]]. 

h4. See also

* [[Hata-tan (rui (hershe))|Hata-tan]]

h4. External links

* "Touhou Wiki: Hatate Himekaidou":http://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Hatate_Himekaidou

title: bestiality
body:
Sexual interaction between a humanoid and an [[animal]], [[creature]], [[monster]], or any other [b]non-humanoid[/b] partner.

This is a purely visual tag, i.e. possible canonical sapience of a bestial-looking character doesn't count.

See [[interspecies]] for sexual activity with a humanoid partner. Do not tag the same image with both bestiality and [[interspecies]] unless both are present.

See [[animal sexualization]] for posts where the non-humanoid partner is the focus of the post. There may be overlap between this tag and [[bestiality]].

title: phantasma_(taimanin_rpgx)
body:
Phantasma (ファンタスマ) and Anna (アンナ) are two demons that were fused.
They live in the same body and switch, depending on the time.

Having two different personalities within herself: Anna has a calm and polite demeanor at day. She gets shy around others, but loves to help people and has a good heart. While at night Phantasma takes over and turns lewd, teases men and likes to have fun in bed, but outside pushing boundaries is good-hearted and friendly, which takes personal risk to help others.

The two personalities of Anna and Phantasma have a good relationship and coordinate through brain conferencing, but their views on the opposite sex are diametrically opposed. Anna believes in pure love and dreams of becoming a bride, while Phantasma is a typical succubus and a hedonist. In this respect, they seem to be incompatible and tend to clash with each other. However, they are best friends to the point of acting like sisters, Phantasma will often protect Anna should she face danger and will respect Anna's choices and wishes. Phantasma does also feel not very connected to her own father and like Lilim is considered a drop out. They are friends with both [[Lilim (Taimanin)|]]  and "Alecky":https://taimanin.fandom.com/wiki/Alecky. Phantasma is also an old friend of Eremia before she fused with Anna.

title: flora_(twokinds)
body:
One of the four central characters of [[TwoKinds]]. A young keidran [[tiger girl]] who was raised among her people but later captured and sold as a slave when humans raided her village. 

She escaped her owners and eventually met Trace Legacy, who saved her life. The two end up falling in love, and together the two try to establish peace between humans and keidran.

h4. External links

* "TwoKinds Wiki: Flora":https://twokinds.fandom.com/wiki/Flora

title: keith_keiser
body:
One of the four central characters of [[TwoKinds]]. A basitin, specifically the ambassador for the Eastern Basitins, being half-Eastern and half-Western. He was exiled on false charges of killing his parents and told the only way he could return was if he brought Trace Legacy back with him.

He was on the brink of death before he was rescued by a group of fox keidran, including his future fiance Laura. Laura vanishes two days before the wedding and Keith is told by her family that she left him for another fox keidran, causing Keith to storm off in a fit of anger and dedicate the next 5 years of his life to finding Trace, only to stumble into him in a tavern.

h4. External links

* "TwoKinds Wiki: Keith Keiser":https://twokinds.fandom.com/wiki/Keith_Keiser

title: natani
body:
One of the four central characters of [[TwoKinds]]. A wolf keidran, powerful mage, and former assassin alongside his older brother Zen. After the death of their parents, the two join an illegal assassin's guild in order to survive, however as the guild prevents women from joining, Natani disguises his birth sex.

On their first mission, Natani is left in critical condition after a spell gets cast on him ripping his soul in half, and he only manages to survive thanks to a mind link being established with Zen. His identity issues are initially assumed to be caused by his mental link with Zen, but after some self-reflection, Natani comes to terms with who he is.

As of Chapter 22, [spoiler]Natani's mind link with Zen has been severed, causing him to merge with the fragmented part of his soul that presents as "Youngtani", becoming one whole again.[/spoiler] 

h4. External links

* "TwoKinds Wiki: Natani":https://twokinds.fandom.com/wiki/Natani

title: twokinds
body:
[[Furry]] webcomic by [[Tom Fischbach]], originally beginning in 2003 and still ongoing. 

TwoKinds focuses on the tense relations between humankind and two races of anthropomorphic people - the Keidrans and the Basitins. The human protagonist, Trace Legacy, meets and falls in love with a keidran girl named [[Flora (twokinds)|]].

The comic was based on Tom's real life experiences with racial discrimination as a Korean-American, and has a central theme of acceptance of each other's differences. 

This theme is reflected in the main cast, which consists of characters from various different backgrounds: the aforementioned Flora and Trace, a basitin named [[Keith Keiser]] tasked with tracking Trace down, and a wolf keidran named [[Natani]] struggling with his gender identity after a complicated mind meld with his older brother in order to save his life.  

h4. External links

* "Official website":https://twokinds.keenspot.com/
* "TwoKinds Fandom Wiki":https://twokinds.fandom.com/wiki/Main_Page

title: ranboo_(enderian)
body:
[[Ranboo]]'s character in [[Origins SMP]]. Unlike their standard persona, this character is a full [[Enderman]] rather than a hybrid. She is a bratty [[princess]] from the End.

The character was originally male, but Ranboo later decided to canonize the character as a transgender woman due to the interpretation's popularity. As such, earlier fanart tends to depict the character as male, while later fanart depicts the character as female. Her gender should be tagged as it is depicted in the individual post.

She has [[black skin]] and [[heterochromia]] (left green eye and right red eye), and wears a [[gold crown]] atop her head. Her outfit varies from artist to artist, but it almost always features an [[Eye of Ender]] somewhere, often as a [[brooch]].

h4. External links
* "Origins SMP Wiki: Ranboo":https://origins-smp.fandom.com/wiki/Ranboo

title: katsushika_hokusai_(1760)
body:
Legendary Japanese [i]ukiyo-e[/i] (wooden print) artist. Hokusai's work is considered influential due to the usage of multi-dimensional perspective and vibrant coloring instead of traditional flat layout and coloring of contemporary artists.

His best known works are  [i][[Kanagawa Okinami Ura|The Great Wave of Kanagawa]][/i] and [i][[The Dream of the Fisherman's Wife]][/i]. The latter is considered the very first instance of [[tentacle sex|tentacles]] pornography.

title: french_girly
body:
A style of popular Japanese fashion, specifically a substyle under the broad "girly kei" umbrella. As the name implies, it draws heavy inspiration from [[French clothes]] and other European fashion.

Outfits usually consist of neutral colors such as pinks, tans, browns and greys, usually paired with either black or white/cream. 

[[plaid clothes|Plaid]] and [[houndstooth]] patterns are popular, especially on skirts and dresses. Gold and [[pearl (gemstone)|]] accents are also common, as are [[scarf|scarves]] tied up into a large [[bow]]. [[Beret]]s and [[high heels]] are also a staple of the style.

h4. Examples

title: corrupted_twitter_file
body:
A Twitter image that has been partially corrupted by Twitter itself. This usually manifests as a row of pixels at the bottom of the image, 8 pixels high, copied from a row of pixels 128 pixels above. Often the result of resizing the original image to 2048 pixels wide or tall.

Since the original image was corrupted by Twitter itself, it's unlikely to be fixable.

h4. Examples
* !post #7490455
* !post #7469331

title: laphicet_(tales)
body:
[[Tales of Berseria]] character. A young malak boy who was kidnapped from the Abbey by [[velvet crowe|Velvet]] and forced to travel with her. He is named after her younger brother [[Laphicet Crowe]], who was killed at the beginning of the game. Laphicet initially acts like an emotionless doll meant to follow orders, but the party teaches him that that's not how he should live his life. He then opens up and proves to be a precocious boy who wants to learn everything about the world.

See also: [spoilers][[Maotelus_(tales)]] - Laphicet after he makes the oath to become an Empyrean and transforms into the Dragon of Light.[/spoilers]
